title: Mark Week 2 with Lisa Harper
description:
Author, speaker, and mom Lisa Harper returns to the podcast to discuss week 2 of our Mark reading plan with Raechel and Amanda. As they follow Jesus’s journey from Galilee to Jerusalem, they share insights about His interactions with the people He encountered; how He was moved by their pain and eager to show them compassion. Join us for a conversation that points us to the One who loves us most. His arms are open, and He refuses to turn us away—no matter who we are or what we’ve done. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Mark reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Mark Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/mark-week-2-with-lisa-harper
